content: one size to fit adult head size 51-61 cm / 20-24 ins with a generous negative ease the rib pattern will easily stretch to twice the width crown shaping does not have a noticeable spiral but instead rib pattern is reduced until last decrease rounds long brim can be rolled twice for a fitted crown once or not at all for a slouchy fit **finished measurements** unstretched circumference approx 29 cm / 11½ ins unstretched total length approx 30 5 cm / 12 ins **materials** yarn approx 240 m / 263 yd 60 g / 2 10 oz of 4 ply fingering / sock weight yarn shown in ancient arts yarns 100% superwash blue faced leicester wool 400 m / 437 yd per 100 g / 3 5 oz skein colour woof collection weimaraner needles 2 5 mm / us 1 circular needle 40 cm / 16 ins long or size to achieve gauge a set of 2 5 mm / us 1 double point needles or a second circular needle or a long circular needle for magic loop in same size as above to obtain gauge to use when shaping top of crown notions 8 stitch markers one contrasting for beg of round yarn needle **gauge** 57 sts and 40 rounds = 10 cm / 4 ins in 2 x 3 rib pattern unstretched 28 sts and 44 rounds = 10 cm / 4 ins in 2 x 3 rib pattern stretched until all stitches are visible 2 x 3 rib pattern multiple of 5 sts round 1 rs k2 p3 repeat to end repeat round to form pattern pdf has 2 pages colour photos on front cover and black and white text on page two
